title: New Statewide Survey: As Electricity Demand and Costs Skyrocket, Arizonans Support Building More Wind and Solar Energy
description: Cost of living top of mind for Arizonans in new EDF poll
content: (PHOENIX Dec 4, 2025) As Arizona faces surging electricity demand and unprecedented rate hikes, a new statewide survey from Environmental Defense Fund (EDF) finds that nearly two-thirds of Arizonans … [+3581 chars]
